name: Chili Relleno Casserole

ingredients.name: whole green chilies, drained
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or 2 large bell peppers, roasted and sliced

preparation: Pour Nourish Broth into frying pan set over medium-high heat. Crumble in beef and add Arriba! Sansel™ and 3 Onion Dip Mix. Using a fork, break up meat and stir for 4–6 minutes, until cooked through.
Cut chilies lengthwise to open, then lay flat in an oiled casserole dish. Top with half of the cheeses, then all of the beef. Sprinkle remaining cheese overtop.
Whisk eggs with milk, Sea Salt and Pepper. Gradually whisk in flour. Pour over beef mixture.
Bake for 35–40 minutes, until puffy and firm. Let stand 5 minutes, then slice into squares.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with seasonal greens and prepared Epicure Dressing.

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavours of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!
